results.name: a(n) = lcm(1,...,2n+4)/((n+1)*binomial(2n+2, n+1)).
link: Muniru A Asiru, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3000
program: (Sage) [lcm(range(1, 2*(n+2)+1))/((n+1)*binomial(2*n+2, n+1)) for n in (0..40)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 04 2019
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jun 09 2006
